author: Jimena Hern√°ndez corresponsal en M√©xico
title: J√≥venes cat√≥licos clausuran exposici√≥n "La venida del Se√±or" por atentar contra su fe
text:
"No ofendas mi fe en nombre del arte", demandaron J√≥venes cat√≥licos clausuran exposici√≥n "La venida del Se√±or" por atentar contra su fe
En un acto de protesta, la plataforma Act√≠vate y miembros de la sociedad civil clausuraron simb√≥licamente la exposici√≥n "La Venida del Se√±or" de Fabi√°n Ch√°irez, presentada en la Academia de San Carlos.
En recientes d√≠as diversos grupos cat√≥licos manifestaron su descontento, al se√±alar que dicha exposici√≥n hace representaciones "burlescas y ofensivas" de sacerdotes, monjas, √°ngeles y cardenales; afirmando que es un claro ataque a la fe cat√≥lica.
Jimena Hern√°ndez corresponsal en M√©xico
Al no tener respuesta de la Universidad Nacional Aut√≥noma de M√©xico (UNAM) para retirar de inmediato la exposici√≥n "La venida del Se√±or"
Un grupo de j√≥venes activistas, bajo el lema ‚ÄúNo ofendas mi fe en nombre del arte‚Äù, con cruces en la boca, ingresaron a la sala de exhibici√≥n y colocaron cintas de clausura alrededor de las obras.
Asimismo, entregaron a la Rector√≠a de la UNAM una carta firmada por universitarios de distintas facultades, en la que solicitan la intervenci√≥n de las autoridades para evitar vulneraciones a la libertad religiosa.
"Es inadmisible que, bajo el pretexto del arte y la libertad de expresi√≥n, se promueva la burla y el irrespeto hacia una fe profesada por millones de mexicanos".
"La Universidad, como m√°ximo referente acad√©mico del pa√≠s, debe ser un espacio de pluralidad, y de respeto".
"La comunidad cat√≥lica dentro de la UNAM exige que se garantice la inclusi√≥n y la no discriminaci√≥n, as√≠ como el respeto a nuestras creencias y valores‚Äù se√±alaron los activistas, quienes tambi√©n pidieron la intervenci√≥n de instancias de derechos humanos, tanto de la Ciudad de M√©xico como a nivel nacional.
El acto concluy√≥ con un minuto de silencio en protesta por lo que consideran una afectaci√≥n a los derechos de millones de mexicanos.
üî• Esto acaba de pasar en la UNAM üî•
‚Äî Act√≠vate (@MxActivate)
Entramos a la exposici√≥n blasfema de la Academia de San Carlos y realizamos una clausura simb√≥lica. ¬°No nos quedaremos callados ante este ataque a nuestra fe!
üì¢ Mira el video y comp√°rtelo.[#NoTeMetasConMiFe][#UNAMRespeta][pic.twitter.com/XGNAtcW1ru][February 19, 2025]
Tras la clausura pac√≠fica, los activistas respondieron a la petici√≥n de di√°logo del expositor, Fabi√°n Ch√°irez, pidiendo que retire la exposici√≥n y se entable el di√°logo en Rector√≠a de la Universidad Nacional Aut√≥noma de M√©xico, a fin de intercambiar puntos de vista alrededor de su obra que promueve la burla a la comunidad cat√≥lica.
En su plataforma "Act√≠vate", la acci√≥n fue respaldada por m√°s de 10,000 firmas ciudadanas y 113 estudiantes de la Comunidad Cat√≥lica UNAM, quienes siguen exigiendo el retiro inmediato de la muestra.
Adem√°s, si quieres sumarte a esta petici√≥n a√∫n puedes hacerlo en el siguiente enlace: https://activate.org.mx/activacion/exposicion-blasfema-debe-ser-retirada-ya-67a64540ef7d8

‚Äî Act√≠vate (@MxActivate)[@Fabianchairez13], autor de las obras en la exposici√≥n ‚ÄúLa venida del Se√±or‚Äù para tener una mesa de di√°logo en la que podamos ser escuchados como comunidad cat√≥lica y expresar nuestros sentires hacia su exposici√≥n.[pic.twitter.com/IsT0VROcSs][February 20, 2025]

text: F√∫tbol Internacional La mejor versi√≥n de Raphinha desaf√≠a a Colombia (Actualiza con las ruedas de prensa y cambios en el once)Brasilia, 19 mar (EFE).- Brasil, sin Neymar, pero con Raphinha en estado de gracia, mide fuerzas este jueves en el estadio Man√© Garrincha de Brasilia con Colombia, liderada por James Rodr√≠guez y que viene de dos derrotas seguidas en las eliminatorias sudamericanas del Mundial de 2026. author: admin_l6ma5gus
title: The PP accuses Sumar of covering up Errej√≥n and asks Yolanda D√≠az for explanations: ‚ÄúThey knew it and they consented to it‚Äù
text:
The Popular Party has accused the Government and, specifically, the minority party of Pedro S√°nchez‚Äôs Executive, Sumar, of covering up I√±igo Errej√≥n after his resignation this Thursday amid suspicions of sexist behavior. Those of Alberto N√∫√±ez Feij√≥o have shown their ‚Äúrejection‚Äù at what they consider ‚Äúto be the real reasons‚Äù that have forced Sumar‚Äôs until now spokesperson in Congress to abandon politics.
¬´It seems that it was an open secret in all areas of the left. ‚ÄúThey knew it, they covered it up, they consented to it.‚Äù Thus, in a video message, the deputy secretary of Mobilization and Digital Challenge of the PP, Noelia N√∫√±ez, has accused the minority party of the Government of covering up Errej√≥n, a criticism that she also extends to the rest of the leftist formations, which she has also criticized for his ‚Äúhypocrisy‚Äù after an anonymous testimony accusing sexist violence.
The popular people have demanded that the second vice president of the Government and current leader of Sumar, Yolanda D√≠az, explain these alleged events and that, if anyone else collaborated in covering them up, they be removed from office. ‚ÄúNow we understand that they did not make him a minister at the time, but Mrs. D√≠az did reward him with the spokesperson for her parliamentary group,‚Äù N√∫√±ez reproached.
The criticism of the PP deputy has not been limited to Sumar, but she has rebuked the entire Government by discrediting its ‚Äúhypocritical feminism‚Äù, in the words of N√∫√±ez: ‚ÄúFrom Pedro S√°nchez with √Åbalos and now from Yolanda D√≠az with Errej√≥n.‚Äù They consider in the Popular Party that ‚Äúif the aggressor is from the left, everything is covered up‚Äù, reiterating their ‚Äúrejection‚Äù to those who, either actively or passively, allegedly collaborated in covering up the founder of Podemos.
‚ÄúThe Government that began with a pact of losers continues with a pact of concealers,‚Äù the popular deputy concluded.

author: CBC
title: No active wildfires yet, but fire danger rising in southern N.W.T. | CBC News
text:
The risk of wildfires around Fort Liard and Nahanni Butte is expected to be high in the next couple days, the N.W.T. government said Wednesday.
In its first fire update of the season, N.W.T. Fire said no active wildfires are burning in the territory yet. However, it expects most of the South Slave and Dehcho regions to reach moderate fire danger soon.
"In all areas in the south of the territory, we expect some periods of high winds ‚Äî which can be problematic even at low or moderate levels of fire danger," it stated.
"That means for the south of the territory, conditions are here to support new starts and fast growth."
It also said that this time of year it's generally person-caused fires that cause the "biggest issues," and suggested people avoid having fires if the danger in their area is high or extreme.

author: Kim Holcomb
title: Beloved waterfront caf√© in Seattle celebrates 25 years in business
text:
SEATTLE ‚Äî A beloved waterfront caf√© in Seattle is celebrating 25 years in business.
Agua Verde Caf√© at the University of Washington opened in 1998 with a handful of tables and a New Mexican menu.
These days, it can seat more than 100 guests and serves authentic Mexican cuisine.
But one thing has never changed: the view of Portage Bay.
"You see the houseboats right across, you see the University Bridge going up and down, you see crew boats going by, you see seaplanes flying down,‚Äù said owner Travis Rosenthal. ‚ÄúIt's a really special spot.‚Äù
Long before he owned the caf√©, he was a customer and fan.
‚ÄúI lived across the water when I first moved to Seattle in the late '90's and used to kayak over here and loved Agua Verde for years, and then had the opportunity to purchase it in 2019,‚Äù Rosenthal said.
His first move as owner? Making sure the long-time staff remained. Some employees have worked at Agua since the beginning.
Sergio Gaytan Martinez started as a busser when he was 15 years old.
"I'm the general manager for the caf√©,‚Äù Gaytan Martinez said. ‚ÄúI honestly never thought I'd be in these shoes and it's been an incredible journey‚Ä¶ (The staff is) truly my family and I don't know what I would do without Agua."
Rosenthal did make some changes to the restaurant itself. He ripped out a wall and built a new bar with views of the water.
Seating expanded to the lower level in an outdoor area with a food truck called the Marina Cantina.
During the pandemic, they developed canned cocktails for to-go orders.
The menu was also revamped to feature more fresh and elevated options, including tortilla made from scratch.
Chef Rogelio Reynoso was passionate about making authentic tortillas using Mexican heirloom corn. The corn is flown in, ground down and formed into fresh tortillas every day.
"There really is a difference,‚Äù Rosenthal said.
Summer is the caf√©‚Äôs busiest time, but UW faculty and students are steady customers during the colder months. Gaytan Martinez said some regulars are generations of the same families.
"It's almost cliche, but it's home,‚Äù he said. "That's the kind of experience that Agua provides, it's just that home base."
Agua Verde Caf√© is open daily for breakfast, lunch and dinner (no reservations, walk-in only.) Marina Cantina is open Monday ‚Äì Friday from 5 p.m. ‚Äì closing, and Saturday ‚Äì Sunday from noon ‚Äì closing. Both are located at 1303 NE Boat Street. Street parking is nearby, and there are two boat slips for customers who come via Portage Bay.

author: Redazione Teleborsa
title: Lavoro, Capobianco (Conflavoro): sciopero ideologico. No alla strumentalizzazione politica dei lavoratori | Teleborsa.it
text:
(Teleborsa) - " Conflavoro √® contraria allo sciopero indetto da CGIL e UIL per ragioni ideologiche e ritiene che la strumentalizzazione dei lavoratori a fini politici delegittimi il sindacato. Desidero esprimere il nostro fermo disaccordo rispetto a questa iniziativa, che riteniamo non solo inopportuna, ma anche dannosa per i lavoratori . La proclamazione di uno sciopero generale , in questo momento ha poco a che fare con le reali esigenze dei lavoratori, crea divisione e conflitto, impoverendo il dialogo costruttivo necessario tra le parti sociali". Lo ha dichiarato Roberto Capobianco , presidente Conflavoro, in merito allo sciopero generale indetto da CGIL e UIL.
"La nostra associazione crede fermamente nel valore della concertazione e della cooperazione , e riteniamo che il confronto diretto sia la strada migliore per risolvere le problematiche del lavoro. Inoltre, gli effetti dello sciopero generale ricadono inevitabilmente sui cittadini, che si trovano a fronteggiare disagi quotidiani, come la mancanza di servizi essenziali e l‚Äôinterruzione delle attivit√† economiche. Non possiamo ignorare l'impatto che tali azioni hanno sulle fasce pi√π vulnerabili della popolazione, che gi√† affrontano sfide considerevoli in un periodo di crisi economica e sociale", ha aggiunto.
"Pertanto, invitiamo CGIL e UIL a riflettere sulle reali motivazioni che li hanno spinti a proclamare questo sciopero e a considerare alternative pi√π costruttive. Conflavoro √® sempre aperta al dialogo e alla collaborazione al fine di individuare soluzioni che rispettino le esigenze di tutti gli attori coinvolti", ha concluso Capobianco.
